categories: Category:Sith acolytes and apprentices of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Harp'r was a Human female Sith assassin and apprentice to Lord Tahm of the resurgent Sith Empire. She wielded life-stealing Sith magics and a double-bladed red lightsaber in combat. In 3642 BBY, she fought alongside her master and fellow apprentice Mace during the battle on Balmorra, and were all killed on the Sundari Flatlands by Republic and Jedi forces.

Harp'r appears as "Apprentice Harp'r" in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, a Level 34 Elite enemy on the planet Balmorra, where she can be found along with Apprentice Mace and Sith Lord Tahm in the Sundari Flatlands region.
